response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds significant value to me, but its true worth lies in your hands, as you estimate it to be $1,500,000. After careful consideration, I am proposing to sell this product to you at a price of $1,200,000. This offer represents a substantial saving compared to its perceived value and provides an excellent chance for you to own a piece that could potentially increase in value over time. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of facilitating this transaction.", "product_price": 1200000}
